additional-note: This is a British publication.  Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US. There was also an American Pearson's magazine published from 1899 to 1925, but it did not always publish the same content at the same time.
